txt.en: You have defeated many wood-trolls, freeing the forest from their vile influence.
Vile wood-trolls have taken hold of Fangorn Forest, seeking to harm the woodlands and mock the Ents that reside there.

You have slain many wood-trolls in Fangorn Forest and brought renewed peace to the woods.\n\nThe Huorn's continued strikes against a fallen wood-troll suggest that it has taken a certain amount of glee in ridding the forest of these twisted mockeries of the Ents.

In the distance, you have discovered a group of vicious wood-trolls. They have drawn much strength from the health and hardy soil of the great forest, but would no doubt use it to vile ends.\n\nQuickbeam's Huorn rustles and shakes, eager to attack them before they can cause any harm to Fangorn.
Wood-trolls can be found in north-western Fangorn Forest.\n\nQuickbeam's Huorn seeks to drive the cruel wood-trolls from the forest, and would benefit from your aid.
